news.title: How did Lucy Bronze play the whole of Euro 2025 with fractured tibia?
news.summary: Physiotherapist Nick Worth tells BBC Sport how Lucy Bronze was able to play through Euro 2025 with a fractured tibia.

news.title: Starmer shares Gaza peace blueprint with Trump
news.summary: Downing Street says the proposals follow a call with France and Germany over the weekend.

news.title: Surge in VPN downloads as porn sites start age verification checks
news.summary: Experts say free versions of such apps or services may carry potential security and privacy risks.

news.title: Liam and Noel Gallagher's brother charged with rape
news.summary: Paul Gallagher is also charged with assault occasioning actual bodily harm and three counts of sexual assault.

news.title: Emergency pleas for strike doctors to work blocked by union
news.summary: NHS England says 18 requests have been rejected, but the doctors' union says hospitals are stretching staff too thinly.

news.title: Thailand and Cambodia agree to 'immediate ceasefire'
news.summary: US President Donald Trump threatened to pause tariff negotiations until the hostilities stopped.

news.title: The 1975 star warns of threat to small gig venues
news.summary: The frontman lends his support to a new music festival bringing the UK's smallest music venues together.

news.title: Watch: 'Never seen anything like this' - wildfires burn across southern Europe
news.summary: Greece and Turkey are among the countries battling wildfires as temperatures spike in southern Europe.

news.title: Pro-Ukraine hacker group says it carried out Russian Aeroflot cyber-attack
news.summary: The Kremlin says reports of a cyber-attack on Russia's national carrier Aeroflot are "worrying".

news.title: 'Kelly is more than the next Beckham' - the Lioness shifting the culture
news.summary: With a hop, skip and a thwack, Chloe Kelly scored the winning penalty in the Euro 2025 final - and changed the landscape of English football.
